title: Asparagus, chicken and penne pasta
ingredients: ['500g (8 oz) penne pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '350g (12 oz) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into bite-sized pieces', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '350g (12 oz) asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2cm (1 in) pieces', '1 teaspoon dried crushed chilli flakes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '60g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan']
